data.title: Untitled Document
data.text:
Neil G. Doughty

Neil G. Doughty, 72

PORTLAND - Neil G. Doughty, 72, passed peacefully on Oct. 27, 2005 at Seaside Rehabilitation. He was born on Long Island, on Feb. 23, 1933, the son of Bernard Doughty and Delma Doughty Legere.

Neil attended schools on Long Island. He spent his life as a fisherman. In his younger years Neil enjoyed hunting, swimming and playing piano. He was also a volunteer for the Long Island Fire Department. In his later years, Neil and his daughter built a relationship that Neil cherished.

Neil will be remembered for his sharp mind and his near-photographic memory.

Neil was predeceased by his parents.

Neil is survived by a daughter, Virginia Davis of Portland; brothers, Warren Brayley of Long Island, Robert Brayley of Long Island, and Lynwood Doughty of Venice, Fla.; sisters, Ethelyn Sullivan of Chebeague Island, Janet Rich of Portland, and Lynette Doughty of Rochester, N.H.; and many nieces and nephews.

In accordance with Neil's wishes, there will be no services.

Jones, Rich & Hutchins

Funeral Home & Cremation Service

775-3763
